content.text:
# 1938 Emperor's Cup final__disambig_1

'''1938 Emperor's Cup Final''' was the 18th final of the Emperor's Cup competition. The final was played at Meiji Jingu Gaien Stadium in Tokyo on June 19, 1938. Waseda University won the championship.
Overview
Waseda University won the championship, by defeating Keio University 4â€“1. Waseda University was featured a squad consisting of Sei Fuwa, Sekiji Sasano, Kunitaka Sueoka, Shogo Kamo and Hidetoki Takahashi.
